channel.title: Project One V2 (317PI)
channel.description:
v2 is under progress!!!!!!! this time new & better source, no problems in client, new and unique big home, new easier shops, much loved customs from v1, new teleport interfaces, 100% summon with many creatures to summon including some custom ;) ability to change completionist cape color, bank tabs, and much more
time logged on server so far = 6 hours to-do list fix all teleport as some inactive 100% npc facing tidy up home add commands add lotty (we all love the lottery) maybe add SOF fix clan chat add crowns add ranks add 100% duel fix ladders, stairs and doors will add as i go
images be up soon guys sorry!!!!!!!!
please leave support and or just comment a feature you would like to be added and il see if i can!!!!
want a position in helping sure look here.... https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,654811.msg4385436.html#msg4385436
